name: ReportResults

methods.name: getFactMap
methods.description: Returns summary-level data or summary and detailed data for each row or column grouping. Detailed data is available if the includeDetails parameter is set to true when the report is run.

methods.name: getGroupingsAcross
methods.description: Returns a collection of column groupings, keys, and values.

methods.name: getGroupingsDown
methods.description: Returns a collection of row groupings, keys, and values.

methods.name: getHasDetailRows
methods.description: Returns information about whether the fact map has detail rows.

methods.name: getReportExtendedMetadata
methods.description: Returns additional, detailed metadata about the report, including data type and label information for groupings and summaries.

methods.name: getReportMetadata
methods.description: Returns metadata about the report, including grouping and summary information.

description: Contains the results of running a report.
